title: fire
description: A fire starts in a storage area and spreads toward occupied floors.

timeline.title: Smoke Detection
timeline.description: Maintenance reports smoke near storage area. Investigate source immediately.

timeline.title: Fire Alarm Activated
timeline.description: Fire alarm is triggered on level two. Confirm fire location and size.

timeline.title: Evacuation Order
timeline.description: Initiate building evacuation. All personnel proceed to designated assembly points.

timeline.title: Fire Spread Assessment
timeline.description: Fire spreading to adjacent rooms. Ensure all personnel have evacuated affected zones.

timeline.title: Sprinkler Activation
timeline.description: Automatic sprinkler system activated. Monitor water damage to critical equipment.

timeline.title: Fire Department Arrival
timeline.description: Fire department on scene. Provide building plans and hazardous materials information. Conduct headcount.
